conbody.p: The licensing models for Katalon Studio Enterprise (KSE) and Katalon Runtime Engine (KRE) are changing. KSE node-locked and floating license types as well as KRE node-locked license types are being deprecated. The licensing model for both products are transitioning to the following:

ul.li: KSE node-locked and floating license → KSE per-User license
KRE node-locked and floating license → KRE floating license
To learn more about per-User and other license types, refer to Types of licenses.
